title: Does PCKF need a new admin?
content:
Just wondering if we need a new admin... I just want to hear who you'd pick.

*cough*[quote]Quote:[hr]Hey, if I see a chance to p*** in a topic, I don't care whether or not it's locked. [hr][/quote]*cough*

Just something to keep in mind...

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mischief.gif[/img]

Begin your vote. I nominate me, cause I know how to administrate, and I have used invision, and phpBB. i also have improved my posting habits... and I think I might be ready.. okay.... that was a a joke... but take me seriously if you want to...

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] Tough Guys Can Fix Their Own Problems!!!
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Prisoner.jpg[/img]
*Under Self Inflicted Posting Restriction*
Visit My site at [url=http://www.najawa.com]www.najawa.com[/url]
[url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?Najawa]Click Here!!! Please!!![/url]
-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Does PCKF need a new admin?
content:
*A few miniutes later at a mortian obervatory...*


Yorp: Watcha doin?

Garg: Gaarrrrg! [Observing Earth; I believe it may harbour inteligent life capable of producing holy toy items.]

Yorp: I see. Can I have a look?

Garg: Gaaaa-aaaarg! ]Of course not! This requires trained professionals!]

Yorp: Oh wow! Didya see that? What a bang!

Garg: Garrrrgggg! [Ah! I'm blind! The light!]

Yorp: Yep! You don't see a boom like that every day! Someone must've screwed up bigtime!
